text.__SUMMARY__: Conus platensis is an extinct species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae, the cone snails and their allies.
text.Description: The size of the shell attains 23 mm.
text.Distribution: This species was found as a fossil off Platense de Punta Carreta, Montevideo, Uruguay
text.References: Frenguelli, J., 1946. Especies del Género Conus. Notas del Museo. Paleontología, Paleont.. 11 (88 ): 231 -250
text.External links:
The Conus Biodiversity website
Malacolog: Conus platensis
